name: ITCube Solutions
overview:
ITCube is a growing Consulting, Technology and Outsourcing Company, headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, with offices in India and UK. ITCube serves markets in the Middle East, Asia, Europe and US. Focuses on transforming and managing entire business functions versus discrete processes.

ITCube offers an opportunity to outsource multiple business functions across the enterprise to a single partner â€“ to the clients.

ITCube offers below mentioned services to its clients:

  • Consulting
  • Project Management, Software Development and maintenance services
  • Contact Center â€“ Inbound/Outbound
  • Back office operations â€“ Accounting, Book Keeping, MIS etc.
  • Sales & Marketing support
  • Portal development and management services
